meanings.definition: The horizontal coordinates of a point in a plane Cartesian coordinate system.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to plot points using abscissas and ordinates.
meanings.sent2: The abscissas help us locate where the point is on the graph.
meanings.sent3: The abscissas and ordinates went on a date to the Cartesian coordinate plane.
meanings.sent4: The abscissas are like the keys on a piano, each one playing a different note.
meanings.sent5: Remember, the abscissas go left and right, just like how you read a book.

meanings.definition: The x-coordinate of a point in a Cartesian coordinate system.
meanings.sent1: She found the treasure chest at the abscissas marked on the map.
meanings.sent2: The abscissas tell us how far along the x-axis the point is located.
meanings.sent3: The abscissas in the math problem were feeling lost until they found the right point.
meanings.sent4: His determination to reach the abscissas of success drove him forward.
meanings.sent5: The abscissas are like the breadcrumbs leading you to the solution of the problem.
